alert.note: Alert for Boone; Clinton; Hamilton; Marion; Tipton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 6:07PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Clinton, northeastern Marion, northeastern Boone, Hamilton and southwestern Tipton Counties through 645 PM EDT ... At 607 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Lebanon to Carmel to near Indianapolis. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Indianapolis, Carmel, Fishers, Noblesville, and Lawrence around 615 PM EDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 115 and 118. Interstate 69 between mile markers 200 and 208. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
